mapper.insert: insert into erp_vendor( vendor_name, vendor_person, vendor_employee, vendor_phone, vendor_address, vendor_credit_limit, vendor_fax, vendor_email) values( #{vendor_name}, #{vendor_person}, #{vendor_employee}, #{vendor_phone}, #{vendor_address}, #{vendor_credit_limit}, #{vendor_fax}, #{vendor_email})
mapper.update: update erp_vendor set vendor_name=#{vendor_name}, vendor_person=#{vendor_person}, vendor_employee=#{vendor_employee}, vendor_phone=#{vendor_phone}, vendor_address=#{vendor_address}, vendor_credit_limit=#{vendor_credit_limit}, vendor_fax=#{vendor_fax}, vendor_email=#{vendor_email} where vendor_id = #{vendor_id}
